description: Relevant subjects include Algorithms, Software Engineering, Software Development, Internet of Things, and Mobile Application Design. Demonstrated discipline in completing assignments and quizzes before deadlines, and consistently attended classes on time.

Relevant subjects include Digital Simulation and Communication, Basic Expertise Program, and Expertise Competency. Achievements include 1st Runner-up Award in the Electronics field at the 2020 DKI Jakarta Provincial Level Student Competency Competition (LKS), and participation in the 2018 Student Company Competition at the DKI Jakarta Provincial Level.
